definition: (literary) paternal grandmother
another name for 西王母[Xi1 wang2 mu3], Queen Mother of the West
surname Wang
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to rule/to reign over
mother/elderly female relative/origin/source/(of animals) female
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘

sentences.english: The granddaughter of the Goddess of Heaven visited the earth.
sentences.chinese: 王母娘娘的外孙女下凡到人间。

sentences.english: But the Queen Mother of ruthless, and finally he just break up this pair of happy couples.
sentences.chinese: 然而王母冷酷无情，最后硬是拆散了这对恩爱夫妻。
“这段引文非常有趣，”西王母说。

sentences.english: It's pity that he paid no attention to her advice.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾的是后羿没有听从王母娘娘的建议。

sentences.english: He seemed to sense her disapproval.
sentences.chinese: 或许他似乎察觉到了西王母的不满。

sentences.english: Lotus faery is king mother lady-in-waiting originally, beautiful and amorous.
sentences.chinese: 荷花仙子本是王母侍女，美丽而多情。

sentences.english: The Goddess is said to own some magical peach trees in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 传说王母娘娘在天上有一些神奇的桃树。

sentences.english: It is obvious that the Western Queen Mythology comes from western culture.
sentences.chinese: 西王母神话来自西方，学界几无异词。

sentences.english: Little emerald green ancient clever choice is odd, constant with yuan abundant monkey business, let king mother headache unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 小翠古灵精怪，常与元丰胡闹，让王母头疼不已。

definition: Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
the Jade Emperor
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
God of heaven/Celestial emperor
Jade Emperor
Jade Emperor (in Taoism)
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
middle of the forehead/imperial court/heaven
Dijun, Shang dynasty protector God, possibly same as legendary Emperor 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
Mu Kung or Tung Wang Kung, God of the Immortals (Taoism)
Xuan Nü, a fairy in Chinese mythology
flat peach (aka Saturn peach or donut peach)/the peaches of immortality kept by Xi Wangmu 西王母
Kunlun Mountain range
lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
